name: Space Derby
description:
Space Derby is a local multiplayer racing game in which you cannot actually steer your racer - it gets driven by an AI! You interact with your vehicle by controlling its acceleration and activating gadgets at the right moments to gain a lead over your opponents. You carefully need to manage its energy supply and make sure it doesn’t get wrecked by the dangers of the track as Space Derby is as much about racing as it is about upgraded combat-racing-hybrids brawling each other at high speed.

Space Derby is still in development and will get occasional updates - every bit of feedback is highly appreciated!
